Articles.Content:
How far can you get Jeb from home? Try this!

Build a rocket that can get the most land distance without going above 10 km altitude. Any addon parts can be used, but no config editing.

Bad idea to allow any addon part. There's at least 3 different fuel tanks going around that would contain enough fuel to propel a small pod-tank-engine craft all the way around the planet with fuel to boot.
